title: Weirdhouse Cinema: Billy the Kid and the Green Baize Vampire
itunes:title: Weirdhouse Cinema: Billy the Kid and the Green Baize Vampire
description:
In this episode of Weirdhouse Cinema, Rob and Joe discuss the greatest vampire snooker movie of all time. Yes, it's Alan Clarke's 1985 rock musical "Billy the Kid and the Green Baize Vampire."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
